column1: vs Weerasinghe 78n9 NLR 334,  Talagune vs  De Livera 1997 1 SLR
253,  and also BOC vs Leela De  Silva 2003  3 SLR 304 it was decided
that  no  statute  shall  be  construed
unless such a construction appears in the Act.

column2: For the afore stated  reasons  I decide to set aside the order dated
16/06/2005 marked  LA 10 and  grant relief as  prayed for in the prayer to

column1: the petition. The application of the petitioner is allowed.

column2: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
